plot: In today's society, Facebook practically is a living entity, and this sketch explores the idea: What if Facebook were a person? A Dark Comedic Short showing the true nature of Facebook.
title: Facebook Is Not Your Friend
plot_es: In today's society, Facebook practically is a living entity, and this sketch explores the idea: What if Facebook were a person? A Dark Comedic Short showing the true nature of Facebook.
plot_en: In today's society, Facebook practically is a living entity, and this sketch explores the idea: What if Facebook were a person? A Dark Comedic Short showing the true nature of Facebook.
